argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | asclf.a | |- A = ( algSc ` W ) |
| 2 |  | asclf.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | asclf.r | |- ( ph -> W e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | asclf.l | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 5 |  | asclf.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 6 |  | asclf.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 7 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K ) -> x e. K ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` W ) = ( 1r ` W ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( W e. Ring -> ( 1r ` W ) e. B ) |
| 11 | 3, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( 1r ` W ) e. B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K ) -> ( 1r ` W ) e. B ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .s ` W ) = ( .s ` W ) |
| 14 | 6, 2, 13, 5 | #P_lmodvscl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ x e. K /\ ( 1r ` W ) e. B ) -> ( x ( .s ` W ) ( 1r ` W ) ) e. B ) |
| 15 | 7, 8, 12, 14 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. K ) -> ( x ( .s ` W ) ( 1r ` W ) ) e. B ) |
| 16 | 1, 2, 5, 13, 9 | #P_asclfval | |- A = ( x e. K |-> ( x ( .s ` W ) ( 1r ` W ) ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_fmptd | |- ( ph -> A : K --> B ) |
